title: Theodore Roosevelt National Park: Nature
body: Nature       Animals - Find out about the park's mammals, bird, reptiles, amphibians, find checklists for birds and mammals, and learn how the park manages some of these species. Plants - Information about the park's diverse plant communities and a plant checklist. Environmental Factors - Explore the elements that affect the park, such as air, water, fire, weather, and invasive species. Natural Features & Ecosystems - Check out the fossil record and the dynamic geology of the badlands, and explore the different habitat types in the park.  Â    Related Topics  Wildlife Viewing - Hints and tips for finding and watching the park's animals. Wildlife Management - How the park manages the populations of some of its animals. Scientific Research - How to conduct research in the park
